system.effect: A frightened character suffers a -10 penalty to all Willpower Tests. The character may be required to flee or cower depending on the source of fear and the GM's discretion.
system.removal: Removed when the source of fear is no longer present, or by passing a Willpower Test at the end of the character's turn.
